ROOT:
-- DaoEmployeeTerritories_D5_SelCnt -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [EmployeeTerritories]
WHERE AND [EmployeeID] = @EmployeeIDAND [EmployeeID] IS NULL AND [EmployeeID] LIKE @EmployeeID_Like AND [TerritoryID] = @TerritoryIDAND [TerritoryID] IS NULL AND [TerritoryID] LIKE @TerritoryID_Like
